class_libraries.library:
<class name="NumericalDifferentiationSplineSmoother" type="spline_smoother::NumericalDifferentiationSplineSmoother" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates velocities and accelerations from numerical differentiation
<class name="ClampedCubicSplineSmoother" type="spline_smoother::ClampedCubicSplineSmoother" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates velocities using clamped cubic splines
<class name="FritschButlandSplineSmoother" type="spline_smoother::FritschButlandSplineSmoother" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates velocities using monotonic cubic spline interpolation by Fritsch, Butland
<class name="LinearSplineVelocityScaler" type="spline_smoother::LinearSplineVelocityScaler" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates position trajectories that conform to velocity limits
<class name="CubicSplineVelocityScaler" type="spline_smoother::CubicSplineVelocityScaler" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Generates position trajectories that conform to velocity limits
<class name="UnNormalizeTrajectory" type="spline_smoother::UnNormalizeTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Unnormalize continuous joints by using information about the current positions of joints on the robot
